website_summaries.verdict: A versatile cavitation machine for toning the body that’s easy to use and wears an appealing price tag.
pros: This 3-in-1 device can be used on multiple areas of the body, including the belly, hips, arms, and legs
Designed to help break down fat and tighten skin
Offers multiple intensities and five EMS modes, including massage for increased versatility
cons: Instruction manual can be difficult to follow
Due to the positioning of the controls, it’s easy to accidentally turn the device on or off

customer_reviews.title: Am I using this right?
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this device. Although the strength wasn’t up to par for me. Half the time I wasn’t even sure if it was actually on. It did leave me wondering if I was using it correctly
customer_reviews.author: IB

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I don’t know what people is complaining about!! Great product, when you turn it on it doesn’t make a lot of noise, doesn’t heat up or anything, it just vibrates and the red lights are on. But some people think it doesn’t work. It comes with pads. It is honestly a great product. I was hesitant because of the reviews but it is worth every penny. You feel the difference since the gist use.
customer_reviews.author: Lesly Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: 👎
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't make sense. The instructions were so vague I couldn't figure it out. I tried to find their customer service number but no luck. I'm returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t been using it for very long, but so far, so good! I feel the difference. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love the sonic feature
customer_reviews.text: I like the sonic feature on my face along with the infrared however the massage isn’t quite as deep as I had hoped
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Gross-Hays

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to see the results
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it enough times to notice any noticeable changes but I haven’t noticed any inconsistencies with the product descriptions. I’m a massage therapist and have recommended this product to other therapists I know. The power produced by Haven is accurate and I’m looking forward to seeing results in the future. Disclaimer: I was offered a newer version of the device for a product review. However, my review is based off of my personal experience and opinion of Haven only. I did not write a biased review based off of the offer.
customer_reviews.author: EMac

customer_reviews.title: I cant believe it works!
customer_reviews.text: I didnt really think this machine would work but after having a baby last year and dealing with the extra stubborn weight I thought I would give it a try. So far I have used this machine a total of 3 times in the past 2 weeks and lost 1 inch off my waist line and 1/2 an inch off of my arms. With the stubborn fat melting away I also lost 5lbs. The result work best if you are doing some sort of exercise along side with it to ease the fat burning process. I have done a lot of diet and exercise in the past and nothing has worked as well as combining exercise with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Schroer

customer_reviews.title: Enough time to use it and see the good result.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for me, probably I was eager to see results after a week or so of using it. I was impatient, probably I need more time to use and to see the good results as what the product has promised.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Mas
customer_reviews.text: Liked the ease of use. Was hoping it would be more effective. Have been using for few weeks. Device has some issues hopefully they can be resolved. I got an email the new version will be sent out. Looking forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mas

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not strong enough, makes sense since it was less than 30$ it was worth a try. Updated Review: Was reached out by the company. They have a newer version of the device that they will send me. Will update review once received and used.
customer_reviews.author: Vi Vo

customer_reviews.title: HONESTLY TRASH !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please DON'T buy this machine! It's useless, its difficult to understand and when its finally on you do not even know whether its really on or not. It does not vibrate or anything, you won't know if its massaging you or NOTHING. I'm so mad I wasted $35 on this garbage device! This is my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: In the video you clearly see me pressing the button no matter what I press it don’t do anything a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: deidre dishmond

customer_reviews.title: User beware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews and thought why not. However, the directions aren’t the easiest to use. I finally got it to do something and it was incredibly painful. I used the slimming setting on the lowest and it literally burned my skin. I tried the water test and it didn’t get hot or anything! It felt like being poked constantly by needles. I have a TENS unit that is not even close to this. I will be returning this the first chance I get and will try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: IT'S JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Just took it out of box. It doesnt work. Its junk!! DONT WAIST YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: neda baghbanmanesh

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool. The settings are a bit confusing, but for the price it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know if it works
customer_reviews.text: The product does not light up I tried the butter test on it. No heat at all. I would like the seller to contact me please otherwise I will be returning this item to amazon
customer_reviews.author: To much money

customer_reviews.title: best slimming device
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and effective. I have seen results in a short period of time
customer_reviews.author: jessica lee

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: Just started using but I like it and am eager to get the new version!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tilly's mom

customer_reviews.title: Lost an inch in a week
customer_reviews.text: it works I been using for a week now and lost an inch. Only thing I dont like is the on and off buttons is easy to push when you use it so you can accidently touch if you dont hold it right. I was also told that if i put review in that they would send me the newest version however I have not gotten anything yet.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie martinez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!! results depend on discipline and using it regularly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for the ultrasonic part of the machine, but the EMS function was a plus. The reason why I gave it 4 stars is because the EMS function is extremely week and when I seem to navigate the buttons quickly through the EMS's different functions it turns off. Other than that, its an awesome and easy product to use and if used regularly you will see results. I've lost 2-inches in 2 weeks using it ever- other day. Another thing to watch out for, while using the EMS function the electrode currents stays on the head of the infrared part of the machine which gives a receiving shock back. (is a bit painful)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: The company offer me the new version . Will waiting for that .
customer_reviews.text: I am really want to see if will work For me. To complicated to use and turn off easy . The company offer me the new one . So I will go for that one . I hope to see changes soon .still waiting for the new one . This one don’t work turn off and the settings are sensitive never stay on .
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gourdier

customer_reviews.title: believe company a scam
customer_reviews.text: Another replace came and do not work again smh fake device and want a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Sherry ward

customer_reviews.title: To soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: I use this to trim my waistline and firm my skin. I just got it so I haven’t seen results but I’ll post again when I start seeing results.
customer_reviews.author: Macs6464

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent product. But could be better. It was easy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sanook

customer_reviews.title: Skin firming, cellulite smoothing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter kickoff for your weight loss or cellulite removing Journey. Machine works great only issue is it turns off every 10 minutes. Infrared setting with the Sonic helps with skin texture and I have really good results and I use this machine about one to two times a week for the last month you definitely want to space out the treatments by at least three to four days. I love it! Great for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Improved
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait for my new version free of charge to be shipped
customer_reviews.author: Lorre Riehart

customer_reviews.title: No results and let down
customer_reviews.text: It really was not working for me so. I would not buy anything again like this. I wish I could return. I have been using it for months and still no results.
customer_reviews.author: Latonya

customer_reviews.title: It’s a light up toy worthless
customer_reviews.text: This do not work it don’t get hot nor vibrate or anything it just light up that’s it! It don’t make any difference! It’s in comparison to a light up toy at a carnival
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen a few results for how often I used it, and I am now currently testing the product on my sister, we are going to use it for 6-10 session and take data to see if any results are happening.
customer_reviews.author: Chardonay

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this to help with skin tightening. I have had 2 kids both over 8 lbs and so it got many stretch mark and sagging skin in my stomach area. I’ve use this for about a week now since I purchased it, every evening after my post workout shower. It works! I’ve noticed a difference in my stretch marks and my husband says my waist is looking more defined as well. It’s easy to use, the booklet is pretty easy to read, and if definitely recommend. I was offered the upgraded version and honestly, if this one is amazing for the price in excited for the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all , it was on and doesn't do or feel anything, no vibration or anything, it sucks slimming device
customer_reviews.author: .Tess Omkar

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I just have used it once and you can see the difference I used it only infrared and sonic It worked for me. I gain some belly fat during quarentine and my belly is the same like before. I like it. I recommend it if you want some shape. I do not use the pads they ar not very strong. I just use the machine. You have to use it every 72 hours so you can use it 2 times a week. Just 10 - 20 min is enough do not do it many tines a week the body needs to rest. Good buy good price
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I could could tell after the first use that the machine was working.
customer_reviews.text: After the first use I could feel a sensation just beneath my skin that something was different. The machine was easy to use. I have only used it a few times. Not long enough to get any kind of result, but you can feel that something is happening. This machine is not a toy. Follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Device half works
customer_reviews.text: The main device didn’t work, I’ve been pressing the buttons and following the instructions but the device doesn’t do anything. The pads though...it does come with 4 pads, which you connect to the device itself s for a hands free option. It was strong!!! I like to use it around my stomach area while I‘m reading. Please follow the instructions, I used it longer and I felt really sore. Don’t use if you aren’t exercising, it will not work in the long run...at least in my opinion. It’s Great to give it that extra push after doing sit ups.
customer_reviews.author: Noely Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Not too sure about this...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen any results yet but for the money, thought it was worth a try. The instructions are a bit complicated. The last time I attempted to use the probes, the head of the device was electrified and shocked me. But I just got an email that they want to send me a replacement with the upgraded version, so I'll try that one too.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I’ve used this several times a day, it says it improves texture and blemish and honestly even though I have only had it a few days I feel like it is working Will update after 1 month
customer_reviews.author: Heather Martin

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the cavitation.i wanted to save money so i bought this.it doesnt work like a professional one at a spa ive had it for a lil over a week and no results vs when i go to the spa i see immediately. Dont waste your money to good yo be true or this one isn't strong enough at all
customer_reviews.author: lasvegaschik

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: The device has been very helpful in dealing with pain and edema in my legs. It has had a slightly slimming effect on my abdominal and chin areas. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this product, but plan to provide an update over time. So far it seems nice.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: true to description
customer_reviews.text: great product with good power. It is easy to use if you already know what it is and how to use it. one improvement i would suggest is a for dummies manual but overall still great. i love it.
customer_reviews.author: sita ingram

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, it does seem to be working. I purchased it a while back, but only started using it a few weeks ago. I use it at night before bed. Maybe it’s just me but the instructions were a bit confusing (which I would say is my only con.) I had to watch a couple of YouTube videos on similar products to figure it out, but once I did I had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Althea C

customer_reviews.title: slimming down is the goal
customer_reviews.text: Used the device 2x now. I had a hard time figuring out how the work it. The directions were not detailed enough. I had to goggle a youtube video. Hopefully I am getting the hang of it. I emailed the company for the upgraded version, so I'm waiting on that. Pleased and hope to see results with my new diet and workout
customer_reviews.author: NAE79

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far just wish i knew when it was working or not it doesnt get hot or anything
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Ok I really like this machine, some comments said that is hard to use, and you cant tell if is on or off, also that they dont feel anything when using it. Well for me was totally the opposite, I found it very easy to use, and I specially think the instructions are clear, also I could totally feel the EMR. Haven't used it long enough to see results, but I really like this machine, so very excited about the new version, if this one is good the other one would be excellent.
customer_reviews.author: JUDIT

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the comments, this device does not buzz or do anything when turned on and gears are applied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel anything with this product you do not know if it's working.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are unclear on turning on the device once you figure it out it's very easy but you don't feel anything you don't feel any heat and vibration nothing. I already have it up at the highest bar and don't feel a thing I have it for 2 weeks now. I purchased this product because I am losing wait but I want to lose weight faster I want to see the difference in my body faster I don't see nothing I would not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: sal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I admit I was skeptical, but this slimming wand device really works! It is pleasantly warm, but not hot. I noticed my love handles melting away (tightening up) after the third session. Also, it works great for sore muscle massage.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: User friendly????
customer_reviews.text: You definitely need to read the instructions. It is difficult to use and I wish there was like a video tutorial for it. I haven’t seen results and it’s been a month. I might be using it wrong but I wish the instructions were more user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Massage Feature
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to make it clear, this is NOT a weight loss device. It won't help you shed pounds or go down a size. However, the sonic and EMS features have improved the texture of the skin on my stomach, and the EMS massage feature is really great. I did notice that while using the EMS feature with the electrode pads, if you touch the metal head of the device it'll give you a good shock, so be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hendrick

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I give it a 3 star is the adapter stop working but after I switch it the machine works great, I can see a small improvement . I have been using it for 2 weeks , recommend using the conductor gel and compression garmet for visible results.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M

customer_reviews.title: Fake news!
customer_reviews.text: This product never powered on. I have not been able to use it! Its is a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: tomeca

customer_reviews.title: Not sure but sending new model
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if I was using the product correctly but I was following directions. It would not get warm so I’m not sure it word however I did feel intense massage with the EMS stick ons that connect. I did enjoy this. I’m pleased to find they are sending a new model.
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Targeted slimming/massage
customer_reviews.text: This works if used with exercise and lymphatic massage, be sure to use conductive gel. I’m so stoked to be able to target specific areas. Update,,, after 2 uses it no longer turns on waste of $$ and pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I will not give it a better review bc it stopped working after a month... I used it once and when I was going to try it again... it wouldn't even turn on. Cant return bc it's too late, very upset
customer_reviews.author: Rosie K

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but don’t know if it really works well
customer_reviews.text: I’m seeing there’s an updated product got sent an older version kinda disappointed in that doesn’t get too hot I don’t know why I would like to see if it really works
customer_reviews.author: Ron Kania

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me. But The company offer me the new one . So I’m waiting on that one. Will keep you updated
customer_reviews.author: Jamal Noel

customer_reviews.title: Auto Shut-off
customer_reviews.text: I've used the machine consistently for a month it started to shut itself off. There is a shut-off feature after ten minutes of use. It started shutting itself off and sometimes not even turning on. I would take the cord out and re-insert it and then it would turn off. I think it was working but if it won't stay on, it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: slogan

customer_reviews.title: So far I like the device
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the device! So that’s why I gave it 5 stars for now, but I will give a real update in 2 months. Sometimes you have to give something a chance to work, so will give real results update in 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Toya l.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, still a work in progress.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help reduce my loose skin on my abdomen. After reading the instructions, I still had to go online to figure out the correct way to use the device. The package insert gave me the basics, but didn’t have a lot of direction on how to use to get best results. Haven’t used product very long, so I can’t comment on how well it works. Seems the same as with other similar products, results will vary depending on whether you adhered to proper diet and exercise. Will give a more thorough review in the coming weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Product came quick. I was so impressed with it. It was easy to use and did exactly what it said. It is easy to store away when not in use. The item heated quickly but not too hot. I liked the multi settings as well.
customer_reviews.author: msjessy1

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The original product I got was not working, so they are sending me an upgraded version free of charge I will let you know when I get it and how it works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How do does it work!!! No manual!
customer_reviews.text: No Manual, of course AMAZON! Never fails!!! I have no idea how to use It!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Spa treatments at home for less!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little machine for cellulite, skin firming, and muscle stimulation. It works well when paired with an ultrasonic gel. When doing the ultrasonic uv treatment on the mid section I had problems with accidentally pressing buttons and changing settings, the buttons are not in a good spot. Other than that it works well but I didn't use it consistently enough to see any real results.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried the product a couple of times but can’t quite figure it out yet. I read reviews and I know a couple of people also have this same issue and others don’t. I’ve searched YouTube videos but haven’t had any luck. Hopefully in a couple of days I’ll have more time to mess with it and see if I can find out how to use it properly. The product itself is nice, it came with everything and the material is great quality! I just wished they had a video or better instructions on how to use it and how to know it is working.
customer_reviews.author: angeline

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: This slimming device is as advertised. You can feel the heat. I use it with a body oil for slimming and it works real good because its easier for the device to slide thru your skin. I have used it on my chin also and it does not burn your skin. It's the only feature I have used, but in the information booklet it has a few more. Depending on your necessity. Just remember to have a balanced diet and exercise to see results fast.
customer_reviews.author: Marijulia Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: This is weak, its a waste of your time & money.
customer_reviews.text: The EMS function is weak, actually the whole unit is weak. Its a waste of your time and money! I have no idea how this product got good reviews. But who am I, to tall you how to waste your money or your time. Enjoy nothing!
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Haven 3 in 1 Body Slimmer
customer_reviews.text: I used this to help with my stubborn belly fat that didn’t want to budge. It doesn’t work instantly but with consistency you will start to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena M.

customer_reviews.title: Please send a working item . Looking forward to using the updated version
customer_reviews.text: Never received the replacement . Ordered it twice and had issues each time . I think it’s a great value for the price . I am waiting for the updated version .i will be able to update my post after I can use it .
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Wain

customer_reviews.title: Barely works !
customer_reviews.text: It turns when it wants too. Beware in DM’s mode the cavitation panel will shock you as well! Did not experience that with my other one from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: LC MUM

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this massager works as advertised. Repetition use feels as it is slimming and reducing fat, but also on a diet so who knows. As long as it doesn’t break I’ll keep using it and maybe update this review in a few months
customer_reviews.author: Kwok Hin Ko

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I can feel and see the difference. No matter how skinny I am and how much I work out I always have had a mom belly sag/extra skin on my lower abs after pregnancy. I do follow a healthy diet and exercise regimen but I can tell the machine is making a difference in the extra skin. You gotta be consistent with it though and follow a healthy routine.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The slimming device is really easy to use. I loved the massage mode. That was really relaxing, I had to make sure I didn't fall asleep with it. Overall this is a great product and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KristinaKey

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't operate
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work at all...following the directions that was inserted doesn't help & even plugging it in. I will be requesting to be sent a new one or refund.
customer_reviews.author: SunKissed

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a couple of weeks and some of the lights went out and won’t come back on. I can’t get ahold of the manufacture so I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is?
customer_reviews.text: I guess I am struggling with trying to figure out the machine properly. When I use it, It tends to shock me and it kind of hurts... not exactly what I was hoping for. Not sure if I am using incorrectly - which is why its doing that? Hoping the replacement machine will work better and be less painful.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Osorio

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Overall love the product. I don’t remember to use it consistently enough to see slimming results but I love the massage features when I have sore muscles in conjunction with working out. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought. Looking forward to new version
customer_reviews.text: I feel the machine doesn’t do anything. I tried to read the book to learn how to use. And disappointed to say the lease
customer_reviews.author: Nadine McAlister

customer_reviews.title: Decent slimming device
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a little change since using. Really wished it turned hot so I knew it was working. Hoping to see more change with consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this device. It took me awhile to figure out how to use it. I just wished it was a bit stronger. Because I couldn't feel much I wasn't sure if I was using it right. I can tell it works great for lymphatic drainage. Will keep on using it to see if I can notice any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Catia Aronson

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to updated device
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to fully enjoy because the device was faulty. But I have been contacted by the company and they are sending an updated device. Really excited!
customer_reviews.author: upalol15

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I saw good reviews about this product and decided to purchase and once I received it didn't make sense , instructions were not clear enough looks like someone typed there version on how to use it. Didn't work properly red light was suppose to come on never did, made a weird noice I thought it was going to catch on fire, so I returned it and got my refund that was probably the best part of it all. Don't bother purchasing this product. No GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: It really works for massaging and slimming. Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this device, it took me a while to figure out how to use it but now that I’ve gotten the hang of it, it’s easier to use. I like that it has different options to massage your body but the best part is the slimming option. I’ve so far lost a few inches on my waist. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lupita

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! Easy to use. Great company!
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe it.....
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I've paid obnoxious amounts of money to go somewhere to have someone do this for me when I had no idea I could do it myself at home AND it's soooo much more affordable. I saw this and couldn't get it fast enough. It doesn't happen overnight but with dedication, it's the best!
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: With diet and exercise this slimming machine will have you slim and trim in no time. No sense in spending thousands of dollars when you can spend less and do it at home. Again, you must eat right and workout but this will get the fat melting in the hard to get areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must use consistently
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product every day for a month now. I do notice my skin is tighter. Only issue with the device is that if I didn't hear the device I would not know if the product was on.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Device
customer_reviews.text: Definitely have to be consistent with it , light weight and you have to get the gel separate . Not bad
customer_reviews.author: MG0209

customer_reviews.title: Need separate on button from mode button
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a separate on / off button from the mode button, I keep trying to follow the instructions but I always seem to turn it off instead of selecting what I want. The company is offering to send me a newer model so I hope this will solv my issue will update when I get to properly use machine.
customer_reviews.author: Vinca

customer_reviews.title: Not so good!
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt heat im not really understandin how to really work it!
customer_reviews.author: Charnisha B.

customer_reviews.title: Neat tool
customer_reviews.text: It was different but easy to use I do see some clearing after several uses on my inner thigh area
customer_reviews.author: LadyNet

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to get use to it
customer_reviews.text: It is a good device, but it takes a while to get use to it, you can really feel the electricity wen in use.
customer_reviews.author: Vene

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay turned on
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I get. I returned the first because It didn’t want to charge. This second one doesn’t stay turned on. Instructions are extremely vague. Really wanted this work.
customer_reviews.author: Yajaira

customer_reviews.title: Ok tool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but it keeps shutting off when in use due to where the buttons are placed
customer_reviews.author: Shay Rogers

customer_reviews.title: well...............
customer_reviews.text: to be honest it didnt work at all...no water dance just a dull buzzing....none of the setings worked correctly....sigh i got a refund
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Heaven on earth
customer_reviews.text: I love the massage mode, it’s my favorite. I get instant back pain relief and after the cycle is completely I feel brand new. I’m glad I took the chance to buy this device. I’ll be gifting this to a few family members.
customer_reviews.author: Bibi

customer_reviews.title: New device
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell if it's working yet since I haven't used it long enough but the company is sending a newer version to me, so we will see! Updates 10/5: Never got the updated version from the company. But I got too lazy anyways, can't tell it it actually worked.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use I noticed results in a few weeks closer to a month but helped when you use the gel!!
customer_reviews.author: Celina Zermeno

customer_reviews.title: Feels great and is easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using this for about 3 weeks now. I don't know if I'm losing fat yet but I will say the EMS function feels great! Great for massaging my sore muscles. I use the sonic function every night before bed and hope my fat begins to disappear! And just to add, I currently eat a healthy diet and exercise 4 nights per week as we have a home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Bo1Indy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to understand how this is to work. ending up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kuuipo

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This really helps to get the product in. The massage part isn’t as strong as I’d like it to be but with the new updated version, I have high hopes that it will exceed my expectations. I really like the red light therapy. I use it on my face when I’m having a breakout.
customer_reviews.author: Annie
